# CallBot Dashboard Project Instructions

This is a React-based dashboard for monitoring customer support and call-bot performance.

## Project Structure
- Frontend: React with TypeScript
- Backend: Node.js API 
- Database: Mock data for development
- UI: Modern component library with data visualization
- Charts: Chart.js for performance metrics

## Key Features
- Customer support performance monitoring
- Agent performance tracking
- Conversation quality analysis
- Customer experience metrics
- Operational performance insights

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement responsive design
- Focus on data visualization and analytics
- Include conversation history viewer
- Provide learning insights for agents
